content: Based on the writing sample provided, I would place the student at a B1 level on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR). At this level, students are able to communicate in simple and routine tasks, understand the main points of straightforward texts, and produce simple connected text on familiar topics. However, there are still some areas for improvement in terms of grammar, vocabulary, discourse structure, and writing style that would need to be addressed in order to reach a higher level on the CEFR scale.
